meanings.sent1: After losing the game, he looked the moppiest I had ever seen him.
meanings.sent2: She always looks the moppiest on rainy days.
meanings.sent3: Even the sunniest of days couldn't chase away his moppiest mood.
meanings.sent4: Her face wore the moppiest expression, like a cloud blocking the sun.
meanings.sent5: The image of the puppy with the moppiest ears stuck in her mind.

meanings.definition: Having a gloomy or downcast appearance.
meanings.sent1: The dark clouds made the sky look the moppiest it had ever been.
meanings.sent2: The old house had the moppiest look on the street.
meanings.sent3: The cat's moppiest expression made everyone laugh despite the sad news.
meanings.sent4: His moppiest demeanor was like a shadow following him everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The moppiest painting in the gallery captured everyone's attention.
